resources.string: Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested

The Goal of Black Jack is to have your cards get as close to 21 with out going over. The dealer commonlyrefered to as "The House" will attempt to go to 21 as well. if your cards count over the dealers without going over 21 then you win, else The house wins. The Setting Menu can be accessed throughout the three dot menu in the top right, or when at the main menu, the circle button in the bottom left.
